title: Guess what riot
body:
Not a single person in my friends group is enjoying this draven crap, not even an option to turn its off in norms and none of us play ranked.

We are all off to play Dota 2 and Heroes of the Storm until this shitty draven stuff is gone.

Maybe they will appreciate us playing their game.

replies.body: I just wanna know what's so bad about Draven Bobble Heads. Geez, chill TF out. Do you play the game 4 the graphics or 4 the gameplay?
Just read that they turned off the draven heads   sigh thank goodness
Oh Man, Just Created my Heroes of the Storm account... ooops my wallet left Rito's bank vault.
